resources.string: "Turning off the proxy feature will set this node to a non-connectable state and disable the proxy server."
Are you sure you want to continue?
"Indicates support for the Friend feature. Disabling this feature will terminate all Friend relationships and clear the associated Friend Queue."
"Determines if a node is advertising with Node Identity messages on a subnet. If the Mesh Proxy Service is exposed, the node can be configured to advertise with node Identity on a given subnet."
"Determines if a node is periodically broadcasting Secure Network Beacons."
